bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a pregnant woman’s vertigo and visual dizziness, accompanied by a swelling of the face and limbs, in severe cases even with clouding and a tendency to lose consciousness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zhu sun 竹筍 quoting Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry dan zhu bing gen 淡竹並根：懷妊人頭旋 , “Spinning head during pregnancy”, writes: 妊婦頭旋 , “ A pregnant woman’s spinning head ”.
